Sentencas: New oxides of the (NdSr)(n+1)MO3n+1 (M = Co and Mn or Fe) series are reported.
Titulo: Structural and microstructural characterization and properties of new phases in the Nd-Sr-Co-(Fe/Mn)-O system as air-electrodes in SOFCs

Sentencas: Compounds of composition NdSrCo0.75Fe0.25O4.(10), NdSrCo0.75Mn0.25O4.08 and Nd0.5Sr1.5Co0.75Mn0.25O3.86 are the n = 1 members of the Ruddlesden-Popper homologous series (K2NiF4 structural type) as determined by X-ray diffraction and different transmission electron microscopy techniques.
Titulo: Structural and microstructural characterization and properties of new phases in the Nd-Sr-Co-(Fe/Mn)-O system as air-electrodes in SOFCs

Sentencas: Their crystal structure consists of connected (Co-Fe/Mn)O-6 octahedra blocks separated by (Nd/Sr) O rock-salt like layers along the c-axis.
Titulo: Structural and microstructural characterization and properties of new phases in the Nd-Sr-Co-(Fe/Mn)-O system as air-electrodes in SOFCs

Sentencas: Interstitial oxygen atoms or anion vacancies are induced depending on composition.
Titulo: Structural and microstructural characterization and properties of new phases in the Nd-Sr-Co-(Fe/Mn)-O system as air-electrodes in SOFCs

Sentencas: Oxides with interstitial oxygen show good performances as intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) cathode.
Titulo: Structural and microstructural characterization and properties of new phases in the Nd-Sr-Co-(Fe/Mn)-O system as air-electrodes in SOFCs

Sentencas: The areaspecific resistance values of electrodes made of these oxides at 973 K in air are 0.18 Omega cm(2) for NdSrCo0.75Fe0.25O4.(10) and NdSrCo0.75Mn0.25O4.08 (comparable to the one of the state-of-the-art materials proposed as cathodes in IT-SOFC), and 1.38 Omega cm(2) for Nd0.5Sr1.5Co0.75Mn0.25O3.86.
Titulo: Structural and microstructural characterization and properties of new phases in the Nd-Sr-Co-(Fe/Mn)-O system as air-electrodes in SOFCs
